questionSetStimulus:
For the following exercises, answer the following:
  1. Write the conditional statement p → q p \to q in words.
  2. Write the converse statement q → p q \to p in words.
  3. Write the inverse statement ~ p → ~ q \text{~}p \to \text{~}q in words.
  4. Write the contrapositive statement ~ q → ~ p \text{~}q \to \text{~}p in words.
